entry.title: Guns, Daggers and My Sweet Little Berry
entry.summary:
Author: moonfox281

Rating: MatureLanguage: EnglishWords: 10,069Chapters: 4/?Kudos: 261

Summary: Dick had forgotten how large this man was. Had forgotten how he used to have to duck down when getting into Dick’s bedroom. Forgotten how easily he pinned Dick against the wall.Had almost been able to forget about him completely."There you are, darling.”Dar– Darling???“What the…” Dick stuttered. He certainly didn’t hear it wrong, right? Did this mafia bastard really just call him Darling?

entry.title: You & Me
entry.summary:
Author: catboyJupiter

Rating: MatureLanguage: EnglishWords: 1,786Chapters: 1/1Kudos: 56

Summary: "What's it, Dickie?" Jay asks him, unconcerned as he counts up the money. His red roots have been growing back out for a while, though it's kind of hard to see under all the grime. Dick thinks dyeing it is dumb. Jay says it's necessary for stealth, and that black hair is way more common. Dick still thinks it's dumb, since that's what he is for, so Jay definitely doesn't need it. "Grow your hair out." Jay snorts. "You're obsessed." entry.title: guilt in the knight
entry.summary:
Author: mathiwrites

Rating: ExplicitLanguage: EnglishWords: 2,674Chapters: 1/2Kudos: 21

Summary: A year after Dick is released from Jason's captivity, the tables have turned and Jason is paying off his debt to the Prince of Gotham. Dick has treated him with nothing but kindness, and on the night of King Bruce's wedding, Dick confesses his love to Jason. Jason must deal with the guilt of everything he's done to Dick and learn to forgive himself before he can love. Beware of deep, deep yearning.

entry.title: Bad men die
entry.summary:
Author: authorettejasmin

Rating: Teen And Up AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 41,019Chapters: 17/?Kudos: 541

Summary: I do not sleep; a symbol burns out in the sky and my body tingles, sweats cold and aches bone-deep. The arms around me squeeze tighter and I feel him shake behind me.The one who calls me brother.The one who calls me Jason.He loves me, protects me and even though I don't remember who I am or how I got here, I know one thing.A bad man is trying to hurt him.And bad men should die. Jason digs his way out and Talia may find him first, but she isn't the one who keeps him.

Summary: “You hurt Robin,” Batman hissed, and vitriol was a charged bullet that was aimed straight at him. “That kid wasn't at fault and you nearly killed him.” I wanted to rip the fucking mantle off your hands, was what he nearly answered in turn, except the shrill noise of a machine starting cut his own building anger completely. There was a man standing behind the alien rifle. There was—fuck, Jason thought. or: the first thing that came in jason's guide to being a superhero was to not get trapped together with the man that used to be his brother. oh, and also the same man who had coincidentally taken up his dead father's mantle.(but it happened anyway, because nothing in his life ever went right.)—for day 5 & 6 of jdweek 2025:trapped together & batman!dick

entry.title: Paper Minds
entry.summary:
Author: Mat_Vibes

Rating: Teen And Up AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 7,457Chapters: 1/1Kudos: 27

Summary: “There are three sisters,” Jason said. “First one’s all light, gold, and glowing judgment. Angel vibes, zero chill. Her door’s ‘Heaven,’ supposedly. But no one gets in.”“Why not?”Jason shrugged. “You gotta be pure. Like, no regrets, no grudges, no murder—basically, no fun. Blink the wrong way and boom, eternal dial tone.”Dick winced. “Hard pass.”“Second sister’s… invisible. Lives in a void. Her door leads back to the mortal world.”“So how do we find her?”“You don’t. She finds you. But only if the third sister says you can.”“And she is…?”Jason smirked. “Death. Looks like she lost a war with a filing cabinet. Does all the soul paperwork and decides who gets a round trip. She let me out last time.”Dick raised an eyebrow. “Because of your ‘revenge on Batman’ plan?”Jason grinned. “I made it sound poetic. And I had killer eyebrows.” Day 6: Fairytale/Mythology AU | Batman!Dick/Jason | Time/Dimension Travel
